sections.title: About
sections.content: Problem solver passionate about technology, the web and data.

sections.title: Technology
sections.content: From the written word to the iPhone, technology allows us to solve problems in a simple way with minimal user effort.

sections.title: Web
sections.content: Software, and the web specifically, make it easy to share our solutions with everyone around the world.

sections.title: Data
sections.content: Data allows us to solve real problems at a massive scale.

sections.lowerContent: Combining the simplicity of technological solutions with the accessibility of the web and the scalability of data allows us to solve real problems at scale, making the world a better place. If this is something that interests you, please get in touch! I'd love to work with you.

sections.title: Software Engineer
sections.content: Collaborated with a remote team to develop powerful social media platform and led effort to split core product into 4 separate products.

sections.title: Business Analyst
sections.content: Managed product import process; selecting new products to import, planning future shipments, developing pricing models and distribution to retailers.

sections.title: Product Manager Intern
sections.content: Played an active role in every step of the development cycle of a complex e-commerce and philanthropy platform.

sections.title: Software Developer Intern
sections.content: Developed model and simulation of solar power plant and web site for client interfacing with the model.

sections.title: Intern
sections.content: Raised awareness on environmental issues, assisted with event organization and attended public hearings.
